snippets:
[    
    // Math mode
    {trigger: "mk", replacement: "$$0$", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "dm", replacement: "$$\n$0\n$$", options: "tAw"},
    {trigger: "env", replacement: "\\begin{$0}\n$1\n\\end{$0}", options: "mA"},

    // Theorem mode
    // Due to a bug in Vim-mode, we can't use tabs in the middle of `$0`'s
    {trigger: "> thm", replacement: "> __Theorem [$0].__ $1 ^thm-$0", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "> def", replacement: "> __Definition [$0].__ $1 ^def-$0", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "> lem", replacement: "> __Lemma [$0].__ $1 ^lem-$0", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "> rem", replacement: "> __Remark [$0].__ $1 ^rem-$0", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "> cor", replacement: "> __Corollary [$0].__ $1 ^cor-$0", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "pf", replacement: "_Proof._ $0 □", options: "tAw"},
    
    // Dashes
    // {trigger: "--", replacement: "–", options: "tA"},
    // {trigger: "–-", replacement: "—", options: "tA"},
    // {trigger: "—-", replacement: "---", options: "tA"},

    // Letters
    {trigger: "pi", replacement: "\\pi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "eps", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "veps", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "ga", replacement: "\\alpha", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gb", replacement: "\\beta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gc", replacement: "\\chi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gg", replacement: "\\gamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gG", replacement: "\\Gamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gd", replacement: "\\delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gD", replacement: "\\Delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gl", replacement: "\\lambda", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gt", replacement: "\\theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gT", replacement: "\\Theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gp", replacement: "\\pi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "go", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gP", replacement: "\\Pi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ge", replacement: "\\eps", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gm", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gn", replacement: "\\nu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gz", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "c([A-Z])", replacement: "\\mathcal{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "CC", replacement: "\\mathbb{C}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "RR", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ZZ", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "NN", replacement: "\\mathbb{N}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "b([a-z])", replacement: "\\mathbf{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},

    // Brackets
    // {trigger: "avg", replacement: "\\langle $0 \\rangle $1", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "norm", replacement: "\\lvert $0 \\rvert $1", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    // {trigger: "mod", replacement: "|$0|$1", options: "mA"},
    //{trigger: "(", replacement: "(${VISUAL})", options: "mA"},
    //{trigger: "[", replacement: "[${VISUAL}]", options: "mA"},
    //{trigger: "{", replacement: "{${VISUAL}}", options: "mA"},
    /*
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "($0)$1", options: "mAw"},
    {trigger: "{", replacement: "{$0}$1", options: "mAw"},
    {trigger: "[", replacement: "[$0]$1", options: "mAw"},
    */
    
    // set 'Options > Editor > Behavior > Auto pair brackets' off to override
    // {trigger: "(", replacement: "($0)$1", options: "tA"},
    // {trigger: "[", replacement: "[$0]$1", options: "tA"},
    // underscore for italics, and asterisk for bold
    {trigger: "_", replacement: "_$0_$1", options: "tAw"},
    {trigger: "*", replacement: "**$0**$1", options: "tAw"},
    
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "\\left( $0 \\right)$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "[", replacement: "\\left[ $0 \\right]$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "{", replacement: "\\left\\{ $0 \\right\\}$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "<", replacement: "\\left< $0 \\right>$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "|", replacement: "\\left| $0 \\right|$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: ".|", replacement: "\\left. $0 \\right|$1", options: "m"},

    // Operations
    {trigger: "te", replacement: "\\text{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bf", replacement: "\\mathbf{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "rm", replacement: "\\mathrm{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ol", replacement: "\\overline{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "^^", replacement: "^{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "__", replacement: "_{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "//", replacement: "\\frac{$0}{$1}$2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sq", replacement: "\\sqrt{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "b\\inom", replacement: "\\binom{$0}{$1}", options: "mA"},

    // Operators
    {trigger: "Re", replacement: "\\operatorname{Re}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Im", replacement: "\\operatorname{Im}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "(arcsin|arccos|arctan|arccot|arccsc|arcsec|sin|cos|tan|cot|csc|log|det)", replacement: "\\[[0]]", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Id", replacement: "\\operatorname{Id}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "op", replacement: "\\operatorname{$0}$1", options: "mA"},

    // Symbols
    {trigger: "ooo", replacement: "\\infty", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sum", replacement: "\\sum", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "prod", replacement: "\\prod", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lim", replacement: "\\lim_{ $0 } $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pm", replacement: "\\pm", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "mp", replacement: "\\mp", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "...", replacement: "\\dots", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<->", replacement: "\\leftrightarrow ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "->", replacement: "\\to", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "!>", replacement: "\\mapsto", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "invs", replacement: "^{-1}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\\\", replacement: "\\setminus", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "||", replacement: "\\mid", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cap", replacement: "\\cap", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cup", replacement: "\\cup", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "in", replacement: "\\in", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sub", replacement: "\\subseteq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "set", replacement: "\\{ $0 \\}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "=>", replacement: "\\implies", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "=<", replacement: "\\impliedby", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "iff", replacement: "\\iff", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "e\\xi sts", replacement: "\\exists", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    {trigger: "===", replacement: "\\equiv", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Sq", replacement: "\\square", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "!=", replacement: "\\neq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ">=", replacement: "\\geq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<=", replacement: "\\leq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ">>", replacement: "\\gg", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<<", replacement: "\\ll", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "~~", replacement: "\\sim", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\sim ~", replacement: "\\approx", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "prop", replacement: "\\propto", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "nabl", replacement: "\\nabla", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "del", replacement: "\\nabla", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "xx", replacement: "\\times", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "**", replacement: "\\cdot", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "para", replacement: "\\parallel", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "mcal", replacement: "\\mathcal{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "mbb", replacement: "\\mathbb{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ell", replacement: "\\ell", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lll", replacement: "\\ell", options: "mA"},

    // Derivatives
    {trigger: "par", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial ${0:y} }{ \\partial ${1:x} } $2", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "pa2", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial^{2} ${0:y} }{ \\partial ${1:x}^{2} } $2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pa3", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial^{3} ${0:y} }{ \\partial ${1:x}^{3} } $2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pa([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial [[0]] }{ \\partial [[1]] } ", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "pa([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial^{2} [[0]] }{ \\partial [[1]] \\partial [[2]] } ", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "pa([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])2", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial^{2} [[0]] }{ \\partial [[1]]^{2} } ", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "de([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\frac{ d[[0]] }{ d[[1]] } ", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "de([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])2", replacement: "\\frac{ d^{2}[[0]] }{ d[[1]]^{2} } ", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "ddt", replacement: "\\frac{d}{dt} ", options: "mA"},

    // Notation for left/right differentation for this project
    {trigger: "dl", replacement: "\partial^-", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "dr", replacement: "\partial^+", options: "mA"},

    // Integrals
    {trigger: "\\int", replacement: "\\int$0\\,$1", options: "mA"},

    // Environments
    {trigger: "pmat", replacement: "\\begin{pmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{pmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bmat", replacement: "\\begin{bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{bmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Bmat", replacement: "\\begin{Bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Bmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "vmat", replacement: "\\begin{vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{vmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Vmat", replacement: "\\begin{Vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Vmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "case", replacement: "\\begin{cases}\n$0\n\\end{cases}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "align", replacement: "\\begin{align}\n$0\n\\end{align}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\alphather", replacement: "\\begin{gather}\n$0\n\\end{gather}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "array", replacement: "\\begin{array}\n$0\n\\end{array}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "matrix", replacement: "\\begin{matrix}\n$0\n\\end{matrix}", options: "mA"},
]
matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, gather, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix
